<div class="feed-shared-update-v2 feed-shared-update-v2--minimal-padding full-height relative feed-shared-update-v2--e2e artdeco-card" data-urn="urn:li:activity:7120363626267295745" id="ember3039">

              Feed post
          </h2>
<div class="update-components-actor display-flex update-components-actor--with-control-menu">

<span class="break-words">
<!-- --> <span><span dir="ltr"> ğŸ¨ Illuminez vos Analyses de DonnÃ©es avec les couleurs dans Power BI<br/><br/>Power BI est un outil puissant pour raconter des histoires avec vos donnÃ©es. <li class="profile-creator-shared-feed-update__container">
<div>
<div class="relative">
<div class="profile-creator-shared-feed-update__anchor"></div>
<div class="ember-view occludable-update" id="ember4214">
<div class="full-height">
<div class="feed-shared-update-v2 feed-shared-update-v2--minimal-padding full-height relative feed-shared-update-v2--e2e artdeco-card" data-urn="urn:li:activity:7099710914718748672" id="ember5564">
<div>
<div role="status">
<!-- --> </div>
<h2 class="visually-hidden">
              Feed post
          </h2>
<div class="update-components-actor display-flex update-components-actor--with-control-menu">

<div>
<div class="relative">

<div class="ember-view occludable-update" id="ember4735">
<div class="full-height">
<div class="feed-shared-update-v2 feed-shared-update-v2--minimal-padding full-height relative feed-shared-update-v2--e2e artdeco-card" data-urn="urn:li:activity:7090654283943030784" id="ember5238">

<div role="status">
<!-- --> </div>
<h2 class="visually-hidden">
              Feed post
          </h2>
<div class="update-components-actor display-flex update-components-actor--with-control-menu">
<!-- -->
<div class="update-components-actor__container display-flex flex-grow-1">

<h2 class="visually-hidden">
              Feed post
          </h2>
<div class="update-components-actor display-flex update-components-actor--with-control-menu">
